metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4634 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in graphs.php in Cacti before 0.8.8e allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the local_graph_idparameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4634` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-5ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-5ubuntu0.2').
